title: net/url: Trailing question marks in query string appears to be misparsed
body: Commit  9f26170 from issue #13488 appears to improperly parse URLs if the query string ends in `?`, such as `http://host/?q=?`.  I noticed through code inspection, so I don't have a way to verify and so this issue might be invalid.  The current playground seems to behave correctly: http://play.golang.org/p/khxLopsBd0
